summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Special Revenue Funds; amending Sections 3.06.055, 22.202.050, and 16.08.050 of the Seattle Municipal Code; repealing Section 18.28.100 of the Seattle Municipal Code; changing references from the "Seattle Center Coliseum" to the "Seattle Center KeyArena;" changing references for certain Accounts within the Park and Recreation Fund; amending Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance 67365, amending Section 1 of Ordinance 90497, and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 116441.
